Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents: Title: Tafsīr Sūrat al-Ikhlāṣ; (5) Pp. 153-195.  Qurʾānic commentary with notes in the margins.|~|Title: Khalq al-aʿmāl; (6) Pp. 196-206.  Theological treatise on free will and predestination. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Al-Durrah al-fākhirah fī taḥqīq al-madhāhib al-thalāthah; (7) Pp. 208-243.   Differing theological arguments, including those of Ḥasan al-Baṣrī and Abū al-Ḥasan al-Ashʿarī. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Ithbāt wujūd al-kullī; (8) Pp. 244-250.  Philosophical treatise on the unity of being. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Qāʿidah manqūlah min mawlānā ʿAbd Allāh al-Yazdī; (9) P. 251.  Beginning missing.  A short treatise on the meaning of the Arabic word karam.|~|Title: Risālah fī ḥall mushkilat kull kalāmī kādhib; (10) Pp. 252-254.  Three-page treatise on the liar paradox. This problem of logic has been discussed since the 4th century B.C.E. Theophrastus is thought to have written on this topic, but his work is lost.|~|Title: Ḥ̣āshiyat ʿAbd al-Ghafūr al-Lārī ʿalā al-Durrah al-fākhirah lil-Jāmī; (11) Pp. 256-301.  On kalām. A commentary on al-Durrah al-Fākhirah by ʿAbd al-Rahmān al-Jāmī. Author is unknown. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Ithbāt al-wājib; (1) Pp. 2-67.  Treatise on the proof of the existence of God and His attributes. Includes marginal notes.|~|Title: Ithbāt al-wājib al-jadīd; (2) Pp. 74-144.  Treatise on the existence of God, the unity of God, and God's attributes. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Burhān al-tawḥīd; (3) Pp. 145-148.  Treatise on the unity of God, probably copied by Faḍl Allāh Sabzawārī in A.H. 985.|~|Title: Risālah kalāmīyah fī al-karam; (4) Pp. 150-152.  Theological treatise on the grace of God. Fragment, missing end folios and includes notes in the margins.
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. $b Library Special Collections
Name.scribe: Muhammad Riḍā Sabzawārī, Faḍl Allāh Sabzawārī
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 5, 30
Description.abstract: Bought in 1223 A.H. and owned by Maysī.
Description.citation: Muḥammad Taqī Dānish-pazhūh, Fihrist-i Nushahhā-yi khaṭṭī, daftar 11 & 12 (Ṭihrān: Intishārāt-i Dānishgāh-i Ṭihrān, 1039 AH), p. 657.
Description.note: Arabic pagination slightly off: after page 169, reverts to 150.
